sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Row, Col, Card, CardHeader, CardBody} from "reactstrap"; import LaddaButton, { EXPAND_LEFT, EXPAND_RIGHT, EXPAND_UP, EXPAND_DOWN, CONTRACT, CONTRACT_OVERLAY, SLIDE_LEFT, SLIDE_RIGHT, SLIDE_UP, SLIDE_DOWN, ZOOM_IN, ZOOM_OUT } from 'react-ladda'; import 'ladda/dist/ladda-themeless.min.css'; class LoadingButtons extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { expLeft: false, expRight: false, expUp: false, expDown: false, expContract: false, expOverlay: false, expSlideLeft: false, expSlideRight: false, expSlideUp: false, expSlideDown: false, expZoomIn: false, expZoomOut: false } } toggle(name) { this.setState({ [name]: !this.state[name], progress: 0.5 }) } render() { return (
Loading buttons - React Ladda{' '} CoreUI Pro Component
docs

A UI concept which merges loading indicators into the action that invoked them. Primarily intended for use with forms where it gives users immediate feedback upon submit rather than leaving them wondering while the browser does its thing.

expand-left
this.toggle('expLeft')} data-color="green" data-style={EXPAND_LEFT} > Submit!
expand-right
this.toggle('expRight')} data-color="green" data-style={EXPAND_RIGHT} > Submit!
expand-up
this.toggle('expUp')} data-color="green" data-style={EXPAND_UP} > Submit!
expand-down
this.toggle('expDown')} data-color="green" data-style={EXPAND_DOWN} > Submit! {/* Set 2 */}
contract
this.toggle('expContract')} data-color="red" data-style={CONTRACT} > Submit!
contract-overlay
this.toggle('expOverlay')} data-color="red" data-style={CONTRACT_OVERLAY} > Submit!
zoom-in
this.toggle('expZoomIn')} data-color="red" data-style={ZOOM_IN} > Submit!
zoom-out
this.toggle('expZoomOut')} data-color="red" data-style={ZOOM_OUT} > Submit! {/* Set 3 */}
slide-left
this.toggle('expSlideLeft')} data-color="blue" data-style={SLIDE_LEFT} > Submit!
slide-right
this.toggle('expSlideRight')} data-color="blue" data-style={SLIDE_RIGHT} > Submit!
slide-up
this.toggle('expSlideUp')} data-color="blue" data-style={SLIDE_UP} > Submit!
slide-down
this.toggle('expSlideDown')} data-color="blue" data-style={SLIDE_DOWN} > Submit!
) } } export default LoadingButtons;
